General.Name: Libertas 7 SA
General.Description: Libertas 7, S.A. engages in the real estate and investment businesses in Spain. It is involved in the development of residential houses under the FICSA brand. The company also manages the apartments located in Port Saplaya, and Sea You Port Valencia hotel located in Valencia for the tourist market. In addition, it invests in listed and unlisted companies, and equities, as well as in regulated markets. Libertas 7, S.A. was founded in 1946 and is headquartered in Valencia, Spain.
